name: IND Corporation
tagline: The Fusion of Business and Technology
description:
IND delivers strategic technology management, helpdesk, network integration and software development services that focus on eliminating headaches, reducing expenses, and increasing business performance, allowing you to achieve the most value from your IT investments.
Establishing a strong and honest partnership with you, we act as your Virtual CIO and IT Department, managing your IT assets and recommending strategic solutions designed for your specific business goals.
We have extensive experience in both complementary support services (to support internal IT staff) as well as complete outsourced IT support and management services. We understand the service level demands that businesses require in order to minimize downtime, reduce risk and improve the bottom line.
Our exceptional staff combined with a wide array of services from network technologies to custom software development, provide extensive value to our customers and account for our history of success since our establishment in 1990.
